UnlockedDescription.default: Escape the Keeper beneath the catacombs.
UnlockedDescription.de: Fliehe vor dem Wächter unter den Katakomben.
UnlockedDescription.es-ES: Escapa del guardián bajo las catacumbas
UnlockedDescription.en: Escape the Keeper beneath the catacombs.
UnlockedDescription.fr: Échapper au gardien sous les catacombes
UnlockedDescription.it: Sfuggi al custode nelle catacombe.
UnlockedDescription.pl: Ucieknij Powiernikowi pod katakumbami.
UnlockedDescription.ru: Сбегите от Хранителя под катакомбами.

LockedDescription.en: Escape the Keeper beneath the catacombs.

UnlockedDescription.default: Finish off a shrieking beast.
UnlockedDescription.de: Erledige ein schreiendes Biest.
UnlockedDescription.es-ES: Ahoga los gritos de la bestia
UnlockedDescription.en: Finish off a shrieking beast.
UnlockedDescription.fr: Achever une créature hurlante
UnlockedDescription.it: Uccidi una bestia che urla.
UnlockedDescription.pl: Pokonaj krzyczącą bestię.
UnlockedDescription.ru: Добейте визжащего монстра.

LockedDescription.en: Finish off a shrieking beast.

UnlockedDescription.default: Defeat the Sadist within the village.
UnlockedDescription.de: Besiege den Sadisten innerhalb des Dorfes.
UnlockedDescription.es-ES: Derrota al sádico en el pueblo
UnlockedDescription.en: Defeat the Sadist within the village.
UnlockedDescription.fr: Vaincre le sadique dans le village
UnlockedDescription.it: Sconfiggi il Sadico nel villaggio.
UnlockedDescription.pl: Pokonaj Sadystę w wiosce.
UnlockedDescription.ru: Победите Садиста в деревне.

LockedDescription.en: Defeat the Sadist within the village.

UnlockedDescription.default: Take out both guardians before the church.
UnlockedDescription.de: Schalte beide Wächter vor der Kirche aus.
UnlockedDescription.es-ES: Elimina a los dos guardias frente a la iglesia
UnlockedDescription.en: Take out both guardians before the church.
UnlockedDescription.fr: Éliminer les deux gardiens avant l'église
UnlockedDescription.it: Elimina entrambi i guardiani davanti alla chiesa.
UnlockedDescription.pl: Wyeliminuj obu strażników przed kościołem.
UnlockedDescription.ru: Избавьтесь от обоих стражей перед церковью.

LockedDescription.en: Take out both guardians before the church.

UnlockedDescription.default: End a monstrosity in the underground garage.
UnlockedDescription.de: Besiege ein Ungeheuer in der Tiefgarage.
UnlockedDescription.es-ES: Acaba con una monstruosidad en el garaje subterráneo
UnlockedDescription.en: End a monstrosity in the underground garage.
UnlockedDescription.fr: Achever une monstruosité dans le garage souterrain
UnlockedDescription.it: Uccidi un mostro nel garage sotterraneo.
UnlockedDescription.pl: Skończ z potworem w podziemnym garażu.
UnlockedDescription.ru: Покончите с монстром в подземном гараже.

LockedDescription.en: End a monstrosity in the underground garage.

UnlockedDescription.default: Outrun a gigantic threat in the city.
UnlockedDescription.de: Fliehe vor einer riesigen Bedrohung in der Stadt.
UnlockedDescription.es-ES: Escapa de una gran amenaza en la ciudad
UnlockedDescription.en: Outrun a gigantic threat in the city.
UnlockedDescription.fr: Distancer une menace gigantesque dans la ville
UnlockedDescription.it: Sconfiggi una terribile minaccia in città.
UnlockedDescription.pl: Ucieknij przed gigantycznym zagrożeniem w mieście.
UnlockedDescription.ru: Оторвитесь от гигантского существа в городе.

LockedDescription.en: Outrun a gigantic threat in the city.

UnlockedDescription.default: Remove an invisible enemy from the equation.
UnlockedDescription.de: Entferne einen unsichtbaren Gegner aus der Gleichung.
UnlockedDescription.es-ES: Despeja a un enemigo invisible de la ecuación
UnlockedDescription.en: Remove an invisible enemy from the equation.
UnlockedDescription.fr: Retirer un ennemi invisible de l'équation
UnlockedDescription.it: Elimina un nemico invisibile.
UnlockedDescription.pl: Wyeliminuj niewidzialnego wroga.
UnlockedDescription.ru: Ликвидируйте невидимого врага.

LockedDescription.en: Remove an invisible enemy from the equation.

UnlockedDescription.default: Defeat the ultimate evil within.
UnlockedDescription.de: Besiege das ultimative Böse.
UnlockedDescription.es-ES: Líbrate del poder del mal
UnlockedDescription.en: Defeat the ultimate evil within.
UnlockedDescription.fr: Vaincre le mal intérieur ultime
UnlockedDescription.it: Sconfiggi il male dentro.
UnlockedDescription.pl: Pokonaj ostateczne zło wewnętrzne.
UnlockedDescription.ru: Расправьтесь с корнем зла.

LockedDescription.en: Defeat the ultimate evil within.

UnlockedDescription.default: Use a secret explosive weapon to kill 10 enemies. (Agony Bolt effects negate results)
UnlockedDescription.de: Töte in einem Spieldurchgang 10 Gegner mit dem Raketenwerfer. (Ohne die Hilfe von Qualenbolzen)
UnlockedDescription.es-ES: Usa el arma explosiva secreta para matar 10 enemigos (Usar virotes de agonía niega el resultado)
UnlockedDescription.en: Use a secret explosive weapon to kill 10 enemies. (Agony Bolt effects negate results)
UnlockedDescription.fr: Utiliser une arme secrète explosive pour tuer 10 ennemis (les carreaux explosifs ne comptent pas)
UnlockedDescription.it: Usa una potente arma segreta per uccidere 10 nemici. (i nemici uccisi con Agonia non sono contati)
UnlockedDescription.pl: Zabij 10 wrogów tajną, wybuchową bronią (bełty do Agonii negują efekt).
UnlockedDescription.ru: Использ. оружие с разрывными снарядами, чтобы убить 10 врагов. (Эффект болтов "Агонии" не считается)

LockedDescription.default: Use a secret explosive weapon to kill 10 enemies. (Agony Bolt effects negate results)
LockedDescription.en: Use a secret explosive weapon to kill 10 enemies. (Agony Bolt effects negate results)

UnlockedDescription.default: Kill 5 enemies with each type of Agony Bolt.
UnlockedDescription.de: Töte fünf Gegner mit jeder Art von Qualen-Bolzen.
UnlockedDescription.es-ES: Mata a 5 enemigos con cada tipo de virote de Agonía
UnlockedDescription.en: Kill 5 enemies with each type of Agony Bolt.

UnlockedDescription.it: Uccidi 5 nemici con ogni tipo di dardo per Agonia.
UnlockedDescription.pl: Zabij po 5 wrogów każdego rodzaju bełtem z Agonii.
UnlockedDescription.ru: Убейте по 5 противников каждым типом арбалетного болта.

LockedDescription.default: Kill 5 enemies with each type of Agony Bolt.
LockedDescription.en: Kill 5 enemies with each type of Agony Bolt.

UnlockedDescription.pl: Zabij z ukrycia 5 wrogów z rzędu, nie dając się wykryć.
UnlockedDescription.ru: Убейте 5 противников подряд скрытно, оставаясь незамеченным.

LockedDescription.en: Kill 5 enemies in a row with a sneak kill without being discovered.

UnlockedDescription.default: Have they lost their minds? Better get past them without a fight. (Ch.2)
UnlockedDescription.de: Sind die verrückt geworden? Sollte mich lieber ohne Kampf an ihnen vorbeischleichen. (Kap. 2)
UnlockedDescription.es-ES: ¿Se han vuelto locos? Será mejor pasar sin enfrentarse a ellos. (Capítulo 2)
UnlockedDescription.en: Have they lost their minds? Better get past them without a fight. (Ch.2)
UnlockedDescription.fr: Sont-ils devenus fous ? Je ferais mieux d'éviter les combats. (Ch. 2)
UnlockedDescription.it: Sono impazziti? Meglio aggirarli senza combattere. (Cap.2)
UnlockedDescription.pl: Czy oni zwariowali? Lepiej przemknąć obok nich, bez walki. (Rozdział 2)
UnlockedDescription.ru: Они что, с ума сошли? Обойду-ка их стороной. (Эпизод 2)

LockedDescription.default: Have they lost their minds? Better get past them without a fight. (Ch.2)
LockedDescription.en: Have they lost their minds? Better get past them without a fight. (Ch.2)

UnlockedDisplayName.es-ES: El cuchillo puede con la sierra

UnlockedDescription.default: His engine roars, but my knife is strong enough to take him out. (Ch.3)
UnlockedDescription.de: Seine Maschine heult auf, aber ich erledige ihn mit dem Messer. (Kap. 3)
UnlockedDescription.es-ES: Su motor ruge, pero mi cuchillo puede acabar con él. (Capítulo 3)
UnlockedDescription.en: His engine roars, but my knife is strong enough to take him out. (Ch.3)
UnlockedDescription.fr: Son moteur rugit, mais mon couteau est suffisant pour se débarrasser de lui. (Ch. 3)
UnlockedDescription.it: Il suo motore romba, ma il mio coltello riuscirà a eliminarlo. (Cap.3)
UnlockedDescription.pl: Jego silnik ryczy, ale mnie wystarczy nóż, by go zlikwidować. (Rozdział 3)
UnlockedDescription.ru: Мотор его пилы ревет, но мне хватит и ножа, чтобы разобраться с ним. (Эпизод 3)

LockedDisplayName.es-ES: El cuchillo puede con la sierra

LockedDescription.default: His engine roars, but my knife is strong enough to take him out. (Ch.3)
LockedDescription.en: His engine roars, but my knife is strong enough to take him out. (Ch.3)

UnlockedDisplayName.default: Home is Where the Hospice is
UnlockedDisplayName.en: Home is Where the Hospice is
UnlockedDisplayName.it: Il Centro è la mia casa

UnlockedDescription.default: That vision in the hospice... why here? Why now? (Ch. 4)
UnlockedDescription.de: Diese Visionen im Hospiz ... Warum hier? Warum jetzt? (Kap. 4)
UnlockedDescription.es-ES: Esa visión en el hospicio... ¿Por qué aquí? ¿Por qué ahora? (Capítulo 4)
UnlockedDescription.en: That vision in the hospice... why here? Why now? (Ch. 4)
UnlockedDescription.fr: Cette vision dans l'hospice... Pourquoi ici ? Pourquoi maintenant ? (Ch. 4)
UnlockedDescription.it: Tutte queste visioni nel Centro... Perché qui? Perché ora? (Cap. 4)
UnlockedDescription.pl: Ta wizja w hospicjum... dlaczego? Czemu teraz? (Rozdział 4)
UnlockedDescription.ru: Все эти видения в лечебнице... Почему именно здесь? Почему именно сейчас? (Эпизод 4)

LockedDisplayName.default: Home is Where the Hospice is

UnlockedDisplayName.default: Not Part of the Job Description
UnlockedDisplayName.es-ES: Esto no estaba en el contrato
UnlockedDisplayName.en: Not Part of the Job Description

UnlockedDescription.default: The water's rising, but we'll get out of this without a scratch. (Ch. 5)
UnlockedDescription.de: Das Wasser steigt, aber wir überstehen alles ohne einen einzigen Kratzer. (Kap. 5)
UnlockedDescription.es-ES: Sube el agua, pero saldremos de aquí ilesos. (Capítulo 5)
UnlockedDescription.en: The water's rising, but we'll get out of this without a scratch. (Ch. 5)
UnlockedDescription.fr: L'eau monte, mais je suis sûr qu'on s'en sortira tous sans une égratignure. (Ch. 5)
UnlockedDescription.it: L'acqua si alza, ma usciremo di qui senza un graffio. (Cap. 5)
UnlockedDescription.pl: Poziom wody się podnosi, ale wyjdziemy z tego bez szwanku. (Rozdział 5)
UnlockedDescription.ru: Вода поднимается, но мы выберемся без единой царапины. (Эпизод 5)

LockedDisplayName.default: Not Part of the Job Description
LockedDisplayName.es-ES: Esto no estaba en el contrato
LockedDisplayName.en: Not Part of the Job Description

LockedDescription.default: The water's rising, but we'll get out of this without a scratch. (Ch. 5)
LockedDescription.en: The water's rising, but we'll get out of this without a scratch. (Ch. 5)

UnlockedDescription.default: Who wouldn't reach out for a man clinging for his life? (Ch. 6)
UnlockedDescription.de: Wer würde nicht helfen, wenn das Leben eines anderen am seidenen Faden hinge? (Kap. 6)
UnlockedDescription.es-ES: ¿Quién no ayudaría a un hombre cuya vida pende de un hilo? (Capítulo 6)
UnlockedDescription.en: Who wouldn't reach out for a man clinging for his life? (Ch. 6)
UnlockedDescription.fr: Qui n'irait pas aider un homme s'accrochant à la vie ? (Ch. 6)
UnlockedDescription.it: Chi non aiuterebbe un uomo che lotta per la vita? (Cap. 6)
UnlockedDescription.pl: Kto nie pomógłby człowiekowi, kurczowo trzymającemu się życia? (Rozdział 6)
UnlockedDescription.ru: Кто подаст руку человеку, который цепляется за соломинку? (Эпизод 6)

LockedDescription.default: Who wouldn't reach out for a man clinging for his life? (Ch. 6)
LockedDescription.en: Who wouldn't reach out for a man clinging for his life? (Ch. 6)

UnlockedDisplayName.default: I Don't Have Time for This!
UnlockedDisplayName.de: Ich hab für so was keine Zeit!
UnlockedDisplayName.en: I Don't Have Time for This!

UnlockedDescription.default: It won't stay dead! Better only fight when I have to. (Ch. 7)
UnlockedDescription.de: Er bleibt nicht tot! Ich sollte nur kämpfen, wenn ich muss. (Kap. 7)
UnlockedDescription.es-ES: ¡No me voy a morir! Es mejor luchar solo cuando haga falta. (Capítulo 7)
UnlockedDescription.en: It won't stay dead! Better only fight when I have to. (Ch. 7)
UnlockedDescription.fr: Ça ne veut pas mourir ! Je ferais mieux d'éviter les combats inutiles. (Ch. 7)
UnlockedDescription.it: Non muoiono! Meglio combattere solo se necessario. (Cap. 7)
UnlockedDescription.pl: On nie umiera! Lepiej z nim walczyć tylko w ostateczności. (Rozdział 7)
UnlockedDescription.ru: Он оживает снова и снова! Не буду лезть на рожон без надобности. (Эпизод 7)

LockedDisplayName.default: I Don't Have Time for This!
LockedDisplayName.de: Ich hab für so was keine Zeit!
LockedDisplayName.en: I Don't Have Time for This!

LockedDescription.default: It won't stay dead! Better only fight when I have to. (Ch. 7)
LockedDescription.en: It won't stay dead! Better only fight when I have to. (Ch. 7)

UnlockedDescription.default: This cave echoes like crazy. Better put the gun away and keep quiet. (Ch. 8)
UnlockedDescription.de: Das Echo in der Höhle ist gewaltig. Sollte die Waffe lieber wegstecken und leise sein. (Kap 8)
UnlockedDescription.es-ES: Esta cueva tiene mucho eco. Guarda el arma y no hagas ruido. (Capítulo 8)
UnlockedDescription.en: This cave echoes like crazy. Better put the gun away and keep quiet. (Ch. 8)
UnlockedDescription.fr: Il y a beaucoup d'écho dans cette grotte. Le côté gâchette facile, on voit ça plus tard. (Ch. 8)
UnlockedDescription.it: In questa caverna c'è un'eco tremenda. Meglio non usare la pistola e fare silenzio. (Cap. 8)
UnlockedDescription.pl: W jaskini echo niesie jak szalone. Lepiej odłożyć broń palną i działać po cichu. (Rozdział 8)
UnlockedDescription.ru: В этой пещере сильное эхо. Лучше спрячу пистолет и пойду тихо. (Эпизод 8)

LockedDescription.default: This cave echoes like crazy. Better put the gun away and keep quiet. (Ch. 8)
LockedDescription.en: This cave echoes like crazy. Better put the gun away and keep quiet. (Ch. 8)

UnlockedDescription.default: Enough running! I'll burn her to the ground right here! (Ch. 10)
UnlockedDescription.de: Bin lange genug davongerannt. Ich verbrenne sie hier und jetzt! (Kap. 10)
UnlockedDescription.es-ES: ¡Basta de correr! ¡Voy a prenderle fuego aquí mismo! (Capítulo 10)
UnlockedDescription.en: Enough running! I'll burn her to the ground right here! (Ch. 10)
UnlockedDescription.fr: Marre de fuir ! Elle va brûler ici et maintenant ! (Ch. 10)
UnlockedDescription.it: Basta scappare! La brucerò qui! (Cap.10)
UnlockedDescription.pl: Dość uciekania! Spalę ją doszczętnie - tu i teraz! (Rozdział 10)
UnlockedDescription.ru: Хватит убегать! Я сожгу ее на месте! (Эпизод 10)

LockedDescription.default: Enough running! I'll burn her to the ground right here! (Ch. 10)
LockedDescription.en: Enough running! I'll burn her to the ground right here! (Ch. 10)

UnlockedDescription.default: I'm not taking any chances, this bus can't take much more damage. (Ch. 12)
UnlockedDescription.de: Ich riskiere nichts, dieser Bus vertrÃ¤gt keinen weiteren Schaden. (Kap. 12)
UnlockedDescription.es-ES: No voy a jugármela, el autobús no va a aguantar mucho más. (Capítulo 12)
UnlockedDescription.en: I'm not taking any chances, this bus can't take much more damage. (Ch. 12)
UnlockedDescription.fr: Je ne prends plus de risques, ce bus ne peut pas subir plus de dégâts. (Ch. 12)
UnlockedDescription.it: Non correrò rischi, questo autobus non può sopportare altri urti. (Cap. 12)
UnlockedDescription.pl: Nie zamierzam ryzykować, uszkodzony autobus nie zajedzie daleko. (Rozdział 12)
UnlockedDescription.ru: Лучше не рисковать, автобус вот-вот развалится! (Эпизод 12)

LockedDescription.default: I'm not taking any chances, this bus can't take much more damage. (Ch. 12)
LockedDescription.en: I'm not taking any chances, this bus can't take much more damage. (Ch. 12)

UnlockedDescription.default: I should get this whole generator panel running just in case. (Ch. 14)
UnlockedDescription.de: Ich sollte vorsichtshalber den Generator vollstÃ¤ndig zum Laufen bringen. (Kap 14)
UnlockedDescription.es-ES: Por si acaso, será mejor que ponga en marcha el generador. (Capítulo 14)
UnlockedDescription.en: I should get this whole generator panel running just in case. (Ch. 14)
UnlockedDescription.fr: Voyons voir si tout le générateur électrique fonctionne, juste au cas où. (Ch. 14)
UnlockedDescription.it: Dovrei riattivare il generatore, non si sa mai. (Cap. 14)
UnlockedDescription.pl: Na wszelki wypadek powinienem uruchomić ten panel generatora. (Rozdział 14)
UnlockedDescription.ru: Нужно включить все на этой панели, на всякий случай. (Эпизод 14)

LockedDescription.default: I should get this whole generator panel running just in case. (Ch. 14)
LockedDescription.en: I should get this whole generator panel running just in case. (Ch. 14)

UnlockedDescription.default: Lure an enemy with a phone call and lock them in a room. (Ch. 1)
UnlockedDescription.de: Locke einen Gegner per Telefonanruf an und schließe ihn in einem Raum ein. (Kap. 1)
UnlockedDescription.es-ES: Atrae a un enemigo con una llamada telefónica y enciérralo en una habitación (Cap. 1)
UnlockedDescription.en: Lure an enemy with a phone call and lock them in a room. (Ch. 1)
UnlockedDescription.fr: Attirer un ennemi par un appel téléphonique et l'enfermer dans une pièce (Ch. 1)
UnlockedDescription.it: Attira un nemico con una telefonata e rinchiudilo in una stanza. (Cap. 1)
UnlockedDescription.pl: Zwab wroga do pokoju za pomocą telefonu i zamknij go. (Rozdział 1)
UnlockedDescription.ru: Приманить врага телефонным звонком и запереть в комнате. (Эпизод 1)

LockedDescription.default: Lure an enemy with a phone call and lock them in a room. (Ch. 1)

UnlockedDescription.default: Use a single trap to kill two or more enemies in The Assignment. (Ch. 2)
UnlockedDescription.de: Töte zwei oder mehr Gegner mit einer einzigen Falle in The Assignment. (Kap. 2)
UnlockedDescription.es-ES: Usa una sola trampa para matar a dos o más enemigos en The Assignment (Cap. 2)
UnlockedDescription.en: Use a single trap to kill two or more enemies in The Assignment. (Ch. 2)
UnlockedDescription.fr: Utilisez un seul piège pour tuer deux ennemis ou plus dans The Assignment (Ch. 2)
UnlockedDescription.it: Usa una sola trappola per uccidere due o più nemici in The Assignment. (Cap. 2)
UnlockedDescription.pl: Użyj jednej pułapki, aby zabić dwóch lub więcej wrogów w The Assignment. (Rozdział 2)
UnlockedDescription.ru: Убить одной ловушкой двух или более врагов. (Эпизод 2)

LockedDescription.default: Use a single trap to kill two or more enemies in The Assignment. (Ch. 2)

UnlockedDisplayName.ru: Все, что тебе нужно, – это топор

UnlockedDescription.default: Survive the duel without using any electronic devices in the environment. (Ch. 2)
UnlockedDescription.de: Überlebe den Zweikampf, ohne dabei elektronische Gegenstände aus der Umgebung einzusetzen. (Kap. 2)
UnlockedDescription.es-ES: Sobrevive al duelo sin usar ninguno de los dispositivos electrónicos del entorno (Cap. 2)
UnlockedDescription.en: Survive the duel without using any electronic devices in the environment. (Ch. 2)
UnlockedDescription.fr: Survivre au duel sans utiliser aucun objet électrique de l'environnement (Ch. 2)
UnlockedDescription.it: Sopravvivi al duello senza usare dispositivi elettronici nell'ambiente circostante. (Cap. 2)
UnlockedDescription.pl: Przetrwaj pojedynek, nie używając żadnych urządzeń elektrycznych dostępnych w pobliżu. (Rozdział 2)
UnlockedDescription.ru: Выжить в поединке, не используя электронных устройств. (Эпизод 2)

LockedDisplayName.ru: Все, что тебе нужно, – это топор

LockedDescription.default: Survive the duel without using any electronic devices in the environment. (Ch. 2)

UnlockedDescription.default: Get a Cadaver to grab and kill a Haunted. (Ch. 2)
UnlockedDescription.de: Bringe einen Kadaver dazu, einen Ruhelosen festzuhalten und zu töten. (Kap. 2)
UnlockedDescription.es-ES: Consigue que un cadáver atrape y mate a un atormentado (Cap. 2)
UnlockedDescription.en: Get a Cadaver to grab and kill a Haunted. (Ch. 2)
UnlockedDescription.fr: Utiliser un Cadavre pour attraper et tuer un Hanté (Ch. 2)
UnlockedDescription.it: Fai in modo che un cadavere afferri uno spiritato e lo uccida. (Cap. 2)
UnlockedDescription.pl: Spraw, aby Zwłoki chwyciły i zabiły Udręczonego. (Rozdział 2)
UnlockedDescription.ru: Заставить кадавра схватить и убить одержимого. (Эпизод 2)

UnlockedDescription.default: Turn on the generator using no more than 10 chemical lights. (Ch. 3)
UnlockedDescription.de: Schalte den Generator an, wobei du höchstens 10 Leuchtstäbe verbrauchst. (Kap. 3)
UnlockedDescription.es-ES: Enciende el generador sin usar más de 10 luces químicas (Cap. 3)
UnlockedDescription.en: Turn on the generator using no more than 10 chemical lights. (Ch. 3)
UnlockedDescription.fr: Allumer le générateur en utilisant moins de 10 bâtons lumineux (Ch. 3)
UnlockedDescription.it: Attiva il generatore usando non più di 10 luci chimiche. (Cap. 3)

UnlockedDescription.ru: Включить генератор, использовав не более 10 светящихся палочек. (Эпизод 3)

LockedDescription.default: Turn on the generator using no more than 10 chemical lights. (Ch. 3)

UnlockedDescription.default: Save Sebastian's life in the hotel. (Ch. 4)
UnlockedDescription.de: Rette Sebastians Leben im Hotel. (Kap. 4)
UnlockedDescription.es-ES: Salva la vida a Sebastián en el hotel (Cap. 4)
UnlockedDescription.en: Save Sebastian's life in the hotel. (Ch. 4)
UnlockedDescription.fr: Sauver la vie de Sebastian dans l'hôtel (Ch. 4)
UnlockedDescription.it: Salva Sebastian nell'hotel. (Cap. 4)
UnlockedDescription.pl: Ocal życie Sebastianowi w hotelu. (Rozdział 4)
UnlockedDescription.ru: Спасти Себастьяна от смерти в гостинице. (Эпизод 4)

LockedDescription.default: Save Sebastian's life in the hotel. (Ch. 4)

UnlockedDescription.default: Get through the hotel without being spotted or killing any enemies. (Ch. 4)
UnlockedDescription.de: Durchquere das Hotel, ohne Gegner zu töten oder von ihnen entdeckt zu werden. (Kap. 4)
UnlockedDescription.es-ES: Atraviesa el hotel sin ser visto y sin matar a ningún enemigo (Cap. 4)
UnlockedDescription.en: Get through the hotel without being spotted or killing any enemies. (Ch. 4)
UnlockedDescription.fr: Traverser l'hôtel sans se faire repérer ni tuer un seul ennemi (Ch. 4)
UnlockedDescription.it: Supera l'hotel senza essere avvistato e senza uccidere alcun nemico. (Cap. 4)
UnlockedDescription.pl: Przejdź przez hotel, nie dając się zauważyć i nie zabijając żadnych wrogów. (Rozdział 4)
UnlockedDescription.ru: Пробраться через гостиницу, не обнаружив себя и никого не убив. (Эпизод 4)

LockedDescription.default: Get through the hotel without being spotted or killing any enemies. (Ch. 4)

UnlockedDescription.en: Kill 10 basic Haunted with environmental traps in The Executioner.
UnlockedDescription.fr: Tuer 10 Hantés classiques avec des pièges de l'environnement dans The Executioner
UnlockedDescription.it: Uccidi 10 spiritati sfruttando l'ambiente in The Executioner.
UnlockedDescription.pl: Zabij 10 zwykłych Udręczonych przy użyciu elementów otoczenia w pakiecie The Executioner.
UnlockedDescription.ru: Убить 10 обычных одержимых с помощью ловушек окружающей обстановки в дополнении The Executioner.

UnlockedDescription.default: Use Executions on 20 basic Haunted.
UnlockedDescription.de: Töte 20 gewöhnliche Ruhelose durch Exekutionen.
UnlockedDescription.es-ES: Realiza ejecuciones sobre 20 atormentados básicos
UnlockedDescription.en: Use Executions on 20 basic Haunted.
UnlockedDescription.fr: Exécuter 20 Hantés classiques
UnlockedDescription.it: Giustizia 20 spiritati.
UnlockedDescription.pl: Wykonaj egzekucje na 20 zwykłych Udręczonych.
UnlockedDescription.ru: Казнить 20 обычных одержимых.

UnlockedDescription.default: Clear the first and second floors of the manor house in The Executioner.
UnlockedDescription.de: Säubere das Erdgeschoss und das erste Stockwerk des Anwesens in The Executioner.
UnlockedDescription.es-ES: Despeja la primera y segunda planta de la mansión en The Executioner
UnlockedDescription.en: Clear the first and second floors of the manor house in The Executioner.
UnlockedDescription.fr: Terminer le rez-de-chaussée et le premier étage dans The Executioner
UnlockedDescription.it: Completa i piani inferiore e superiore in The Executioner.
UnlockedDescription.pl: Oczyść pierwsze i drugie piętro posiadłości w pakiecie The Executioner.
UnlockedDescription.ru: Пройти первый и второй этажи особняка в дополнении The Executioner.

UnlockedDescription.default: Clear the basement of the manor house in The Executioner.
UnlockedDescription.de: Säubere den Keller des Anwesens in The Executioner.
UnlockedDescription.es-ES: Despeja el sótano de la mansión en The Executioner
UnlockedDescription.en: Clear the basement of the manor house in The Executioner.
UnlockedDescription.fr: Terminer le sous-sol dans The Executioner
UnlockedDescription.it: Completa il seminterrato della tenuta in The Executioner.
UnlockedDescription.pl: Oczyść piwnicę posiadłości w pakiecie The Executioner.
UnlockedDescription.ru: Пройти подвал особняка в дополнении The Executioner.

UnlockedDescription.default: Clear The Executioner without taking any damage.
UnlockedDescription.de: Schließe The Executioner ab, ohne Schaden zu erleiden.
UnlockedDescription.es-ES: Completa The Executioner sin sufrir daños
UnlockedDescription.en: Clear The Executioner without taking any damage.
UnlockedDescription.fr: Terminer The Executioner sans subir de dégâts
UnlockedDescription.it: Completa The Executioner senza subire danni.
UnlockedDescription.pl: Ukończ pakiet The Executioner, nie odnosząc żadnych obrażeń.
UnlockedDescription.ru: Пройти дополнение The Executioner, не получив повреждений.

UnlockedDescription.default: Get payback on the cop who took down your predecessor.
UnlockedDescription.de: Räche dich an dem Cop, der deinen Vorgänger besiegt hat.
UnlockedDescription.es-ES: Véngate del policía que derrotó a tu predecesor
UnlockedDescription.en: Get payback on the cop who took down your predecessor.
UnlockedDescription.fr: Prendre votre revanche sur le flic qui a descendu votre prédécesseur
UnlockedDescription.it: Vendicati dello sbirro che aveva sconfitto il tuo predecessore.
UnlockedDescription.pl: Zemścij się na gliniarzu, który załatwił twojego poprzednika.
UnlockedDescription.ru: Отомстить полицейскому, который одолел вашего предшественника.
